name: Cash Rush
description: Cash Rush is a Shop Game simulator. Create your business from scratch, use decorations to increase your margin, hire new employee and start making the billions you deserve!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 130 MB MB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
